tool_description: Converts visual mockups into interactive prototypes with clickable elements, screen transitions, and basic user flow simulation.

mockup_screens.description: List of mockup screen identifiers to include in prototype

interaction_types.description: Types of interactions to include (tap, swipe, scroll, drag, pinch)

transition_style.description: Screen transition style: slide, fade, push, modal, or instant

prototype_fidelity.description: Prototype fidelity level: low, medium, or high

device_type.description: Target device type: phone, tablet, or universal

error_messages: Insufficient screens: Provide at least 2 mockup screens for meaningful prototype
Too many screens: Limit to 25 screens for optimal prototype performance
Invalid interaction types: Use tap, swipe, scroll, drag, or pinch
Invalid transition style: Use slide, fade, push, modal, or instant
Invalid prototype fidelity: Use low, medium, or high
Invalid device type: Use phone, tablet, or universal
Missing screen flow data: Provide valid navigation flow information
usage: Specify mockup_screens, screen_flow_data, and interaction_types; optionally configure transition_style, prototype_fidelity, and device_type to generate an interactive prototype.

prototype_url.description: URL or identifier for accessing the interactive prototype

interaction_map.description: Map of clickable elements and their target screens

user_flows.description: Available user flows in the prototype

prototype_features.description: List of functional features in the prototype

testing_scenarios.description: Suggested testing scenarios for the prototype
